title: Super Bowl Predictions and Coaching Updates
description:
Kevin, Danny, and Ben discuss, dissect, and share their picks for Super Bowl LVI from Radio Row. They wrap up the pod by reacting to some of the recent coaching updates around the NFL. (34:46)
Hosts: Kevin Clark, Danny Kelly and Ben Solak
Producer: Arjuna Ramgopal
Production Assistance: Chris Sutton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
